user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for “Whispers of the Past” Cover Design Details  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the full brief and any reference materials for the “Whispers of the Past” cover (you mentioned they’re in your Notion workspace)? You can forward everything to ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com whenever convenient.

Thanks so much for your help—looking forward to getting started!

Best,  
Ethan
